attributes.action: Government grant should  apply to any business irrespective of rateable value
attributes.additional_details: As you know during the pandemic time every  business in the U.K is suffering Government has announced £25,000 for any retail,Hospitality ,leisure business operating from a smaller premises with rateable value less than £51,000.There are large number of small businesses who operate from shopping malls,whose rateable value is over £51000. They should be eligible for the relief too.In current climate when the business are suffering this £25,000 grant will give us a chance to keep business on float
attributes.background: Government has approved a grant of £25,000 to retail, Hospitality and leisure business operating from smaller premises, We want government to relax the grant for small businesses operating in shopping centre or high street irrespective of there rateable value.
